body:
Hi
I assigned windows, but by adding materials an error occurs. "**The material can't be find in library**", However, it is added in library. What's the problem?
Thanks for your help [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/s7s9Z08DG1wMnWz*a*rVFhPRarJ3Y24Dzb9*gk7s32ctTdBt1Htr4KB1JNgMK*gCe90omPXhWqLBZROzEXtpvNqGOmjBPUeD/Untitled.png)
